lyric:
[00:00.530]Let's Marvin Gaye and get it on
[00:04.830]You got the healing that I want
[00:09.240]Just like they say it in the song
[00:12.230]Until the dawn, let's Marvin Gaye and get it on
[00:17.980]We got this king size to ourselves
[00:22.420]Don't have to share with no one else
[00:26.690]Don't keep your secrets to yourself
[00:30.630]It's karma sutra show and tell
[00:35.020]Yeah woah
[00:38.430]There's loving in your eyes
[00:41.430]That pulls me closer
[00:45.670]It's so subtle, I'm in trouble
[00:49.770]But I'd love to be in trouble with you
[00:52.880]Let's Marvin Gaye and get it on
[00:57.200]You got the healing that I want
[01:01.660]Just like they say it in the song
[01:04.580]Until the dawn, let's Marvin Gaye and get it on
[01:10.380]You got to give it up to me
[01:14.760]I'm screaming mercy, mercy please
[01:19.160]Just like they say it in the song
[01:22.120]Until the dawn, let's Marvin Gaye and get it on
[01:27.940]And when you leave me all alone
[01:32.310]I'm like a stray without a home
[01:36.660]I'm like a dog without a bone
[01:40.720]I just want you for my own
[01:44.210]I got to have you babe
[01:46.340]Woah
[01:48.170]There's loving in your eyes
[01:51.290]That pulls me closer
[01:55.180]It's so subtle, I'm in trouble
[01:59.520]But I'd rather to be in trouble with you
[02:03.240]Let's Marvin Gaye and get it on
[02:08.630]You got the healing that you want
[02:12.300]Like they say it in the songs
[02:15.980]Until the dawn, let's Marvin Gaye and get it on
[02:20.220]Let's Marvin Gaye and get it on
[02:24.640]You got the healing that I want
[02:28.950]Just like they say it in the song
[02:32.010]Until the dawn, let's Marvin Gaye and get it on
[02:37.660]You got to give it up to me
[02:42.190]I'm screaming mercy, mercy please
[02:46.350]Just like they say it in the song
[02:49.450]Until the dawn, let's Marvin Gaye and get it on
[02:55.090]Just like they say it in the song
[02:58.130]Until the dawn, let's Marvin Gaye and get it on
tlyric:
[by:咆哮的小清新___]
[00:00.530]来一首马文盖伊 让这旋律燃起我们心中的爱意
[00:04.830]唯有你才能将我心的不安治愈
[00:09.240]就让我们如那歌中所唱般释放自己
[00:12.230]激情酣畅直到黎明  让那旋律点燃我们心中的爱意
[00:17.980]我们有一张特大号的床
[00:22.420]不必与他人将良夜共享
[00:26.690]你也不必将心事隐藏
[00:30.630]巫山云雨过后一切将了然心上
[00:35.020]耶 喔噢噢
[00:38.430]你眼中的浓浓爱意
[00:41.430]让我情不自禁向你靠近
[00:45.670]如此微妙 让我深陷其中
[00:49.770]但因为是你 我便乐在其中 甘之如饴
[00:52.880]来一首马文盖伊 让这旋律燃起我们心中的爱意
[00:57.200]唯有你才能将我心的不安治愈
[01:01.660]就让我们如那歌中所唱般释放自己
[01:04.580]激情酣畅直到黎明  让那旋律点燃我们心中的爱意
[01:10.380]你给予了我你全部的热情
[01:14.760]我也早已沦陷在你的温柔里
[01:19.160]就让我们如那歌中所唱般释放自己
[01:22.120]激情酣畅直到黎明  让那旋律点燃我们心中的爱意
[01:27.940]当你离去 留我孤身一人
[01:32.310]我便像无家可归的孤单灵魂
[01:36.660]像失去心爱骨头的狗狗
[01:40.720]只希望你 能专属于我
[01:44.210]而我也能将亲爱的你独自占有
[01:46.340]喔噢噢
[01:48.170]你眼中的浓浓爱意
[01:51.290]让我情不自禁向你靠近
[01:55.180]如此微妙 让我深陷其中
